titleStmt.title: A general epistle from the Holy Spirit unto all prophets, ministers, or speakers in the world ... [by] John Reeve and Lodowick Muggleton, the two last spiritual witnesses and alone true prophets of the Holy Spirit by commission from the true God... London, 1653 in the second year of our commission by voice from Heaven.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.
Muggleton, Lodowick, 1609-1698.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from title.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
